heroSection.description: Paxful is a global peer-to-peer platform building a financial system for the 100% — one #Bitcoin at a time.

CHALLENGES_DATA.ChallengeDescription: The Client approached us with an exciting challenge: we needed to implement solutions that would appeal to a modern customer, while keeping in mind business objectives regarding scalability. This meant that any product created for the client would have to be as self-sufficient as possible, with minimal maintenance down the line.

processSection.description: Despite a tight timeline, we were armed with a strong knowledge base and an ever-relentless can-do attitude, which is what enabled us to deliver a world-class PWA for Bloom. The PWA was built after monitoring the behavioral patterns of the client’s target audience, in order to ensure easy onboarding, great functionality, and appealing aesthetics.

resultSection.description: Despite a tight timeline, we were armed with a strong knowledge base and an ever-relentless can-do attitude, which is what enabled us to deliver a world-class PWA for Bloom.
